dashboard.title: Data Pipeline Health Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time monitoring of bronze, silver, and gold layer pipelines

targets.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as success_count FROM airflow.task_instance WHERE state = 'success' AND execution_date >= CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) as failed_count FROM airflow.task_instance WHERE state = 'failed' AND execution_date >= CURRENT_DATE()

SELECT execution_date, AVG(DATEDIFF('minute', start_date, end_date)) as avg_duration FROM airflow.task_instance WHERE dag_id IN ('bronze_data_pipeline', 'silver_data_pipeline', 'gold_data_pipeline') GROUP BY execution_date ORDER BY execution_date DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT 'bronze' as layer, MAX(cst_create_date) as latest_data FROM bronze.crm_cust_info UNION ALL SELECT 'silver' as layer, MAX(cst_create_date) as latest_data FROM silver.crm_cust_info UNION ALL SELECT 'gold' as layer, MAX(create_date) as latest_data FROM gold.dim_customers
